FidGrit is the most Comprehensive Sports Management platform for Athletes, Event Organizers and Sports Clubs. Our goal is to enable sports professionals with latest technology advancements that tend to benefit professionals only.
FidGrit offers wide range of products as mentioned below  



### Sports Ladder ###
FidGrit supports three types of Ladder formats 
**League Ladder**
League Ladder organizes and ranks players, who compete against one another on a regular basis, in continuously recurring Round Robin sessions. 
 
**Box Ladder**
In Box Ladder players are arranged in Divisions based on their skills or as setup by Admins.
When session starts, each player will compete against every other participant in their Box and at the end of the session Box winners will move to higher level Box, and losers will be demoted to lower level Box and a new session will be created with new Box assignments.
 
**Challenger Ladder**
Players can challenge opponents at higher rank that falls within challenge range, and if lower rank challenger wins then they replace opponent at that position and unlocks even higher rank players.
 

### League ###
FidGrit Leagues are organized by League Programs that can be season or skill based. FidGrit offers two types of programs including traditional Event Based Sports League Program and Flexi League Program.
These programs can be further subdivided into divisions so you can manage players and match schedules easily.

** Event Based League Program **
In Event based Leagues, players will play as part of events organized within the League. In this format, Admin decides which member will play in which event. FidGrit Event League Program supports three types of events

** Flexi League Program ** 
Flexi Leagues, just like name suggests, are highly flexible in nature and provide players the convenience of flexible match scheduling.
Admins can further subdivide Flexi Leagues into multiple divisions based on players location or weekly schedule.

 


### Tournament ###
FidGrit Tournament supports up to 10 events per Tournament, which together can have more than 1200 players. 
FidGrit Tournament supports three types of events
Round Robin
Single Elimination
Pool Play Expedition
 

### Sports Group ###
FidGrit Sports Group allows Admins to organize sports specific events or practice sessions at their clubs and enable members to pick up matches with other group members.

Group members can post open matches at the club location, this can be a doubles or singles match. The open match is broadcasted to all the group members and can be picked up by anyone who is available and would like to play that match.


###Sports Team Management###
Unlike any other sports team management system, FidGrit team management is sports specific and provides professional quality stats and record keeping for the sports you chose without the hassle of setting up your website or installing a software.

 
###Sports Clubs###
Sports clubs and facilities get their own page and space on FidGrit. Users can search nearby Sports Facilities and Clubs, look for details, ongoing sports events and frequent players visiting the facility.
When a match is tagged with a club, it starts appearing on the facility page as well. Users can rate and review a facility, and if it’s a private club then you can own your facility page and edit its details.
